settings.image_alt: Shop Joah Brown Tanks and Crops
Joah Brown Spring Capsule Collection Lookbook

settings.login_description: View your order history, manage addresses, and adjust preferences.
settings.not_member_description: Create an account to check out faster, track orders, adjust preferences and view order details all in one place.

settings.title: Where is JOAH BROWN clothing made?
settings.description: JOAH BROWN clothing is made in Los Angeles, CA. By manufacturing locally we are constantly reducing our carbon footprint, as we work to contribute to an eco-conscious future.

settings.title: Can I make adjustments to my order?
settings.description: Once an order is placed we are unable to make any adjustments to it. This would include canceling the order, adding or removing items from the order, editing the order or changing the shipping address the order is being sent to.

settings.title: What is Route?
settings.description: Route is our shipping insurance! It is the only way to cover the cost of your order in the event that the package is lost or stolen. We highly recommend selecting to include this at check out!

settings.title: Is your site only in USD?
settings.description: Yes, our site is in USD, along with the total cost of your order.

settings.title: Where do you ship?
settings.description:
We can ship to pretty much everywhere!

Excluding: Russia

settings.title: The style I wanted is sold out! How can I find out if it’s being restocked?
settings.description: Items can sell out quickly but there is a chance that we could be getting more in stock. Sign up for the product wait list by entering your email address on the product page and you will be the first to know when that item comes back in stock!

settings.title: Why isn’t my discount code working?
settings.description: Be sure to double check your spelling. If you are still having issues with your discount code, please reach out to our customer service team with your code and we’ll be happy to help you troubleshoot.

settings.title: I forgot to add my discount code. Can you apply it after I placed my order?
settings.description: Once an order is placed we cannot retroactively apply the discount code. Please save this code for your next order!

settings.title: I didn't receive a confirmation email, did my order go through?
settings.description: If you have not received an order confirmation within 24 hours, please contact our customer service team here.

settings.title: My tracking number says my package was delivered, but I haven’t received it.
settings.description: Once an order leaves our warehouse, we cannot be held responsible for those lost or stolen packages. If your package has not arrived within 3 days of the delivery date, you will need to file a claim directly with the carrier. We are unable to file a claim for customers.

settings.title: Can I use my own return shipping label for a domestic return?
settings.description:
Return requests must be submitted through our return portal. After submitting your request, you will receive an email with your return shipping label. At this time, our returns portal only supports domestic returns. 

If you are an international customer, you can ship your items back to this address:
Joah Brown LLC Attn: Returns
5045 6th St. #2,
Carpinteria, CA 93013

settings.title: Can I return an item I purchased at another retailer?
settings.description: Unfortunately, we cannot accept items purchased from another retailer. Please contact the retailer directly with your proof of purchase.

settings.title: Do you offer price adjustments?
settings.description:
Unfortunately, we do not offer price adjustments.

If a return and re-order is attempted, we will deny the return request and will only refund what was paid on the duplicate order.

settings.title: Who is Joah Brown?
settings.description: Joah Brown is our co-founder and designer. You can learn more about her inspiration for the brand here and follow her @JOAH. To keep up with the latest you can also follow us at @JOAHBROWN

settings.title: RETURN INFORMATION
settings.description:
If for any reason you are not happy with your purchase, you can return items that are unworn, unwashed, free of any stains (like deodorant or makeup), scuffs, tears, snags and mysterious smells items for a refund (excluding original shipping charges) within 14 days of the date of receiving your package. Any returned items must be in “sellable condition.” All garments must be returned in their original packaging with the manufacturer tags attached.

Please include your packing slip in your return. Packages returned without this may cause a delay in the return process.

Return shipping labels range $8-$12 depending on weight and location. You may choose to return with your own shipping label but we advise using a trackable method. We are not responsible for items lost in transit. We do not currently offer return labels for international customers.

settings.title: PROCESSING
settings.description: Please allow 7-10 business days for packages to be processed once they reach our warehouse. Refunds will be returned to the original payment method. It can take your financial institution up to 10 business days to reflect payment on your account.

settings.title: STORE CREDIT
settings.description: We offer free return shipping for store credits. We currently do not offer exchanges.

settings.title: RETURN PROCESS
settings.description:
To start your return process, click the link below.

LAUNCH RETURNS PORTAL

Please include this form in your return package.

settings.title: DAMAGED RETURNS
settings.description: Returns that are damaged, soiled or returned without their original labels will not be accepted and will be sent back to the customer. We will not accept returned garments that were not approved in our returns portal. No exceptions.

settings.title: DEFECTIVE ITEMS
settings.description:
If you receive a defective item, please notify us within 2 days of delivery. 

Once our team has provided a return label & approved the defective item, it must be shipped back within 7 days of receiving the shipping label.

settings.title: NON-RETURNABLE ITEMS
settings.description:
Items that have been worn, washed, stained, or damaged

Items without the original tags and packaging

Gift Cards

Items marked FINAL SALE

Final sale items will not be accepted and will be sent back to the customer.

settings.title: INTERNATIONAL RETURNS
settings.description:
Please see the International Orders return policy here.

We will not be held liable for the loss of any returned item(s) during the transit back to us. We advise sending your goods back via a tracked service and retaining proof of postage until you receive your refund notification.

On receiving your returned item(s) we will refund the price paid for the goods to the original payment card. The original delivery costs (where applicable) will not be refunded. Returns are credited to the original payment method, unless received more than 14 days after the delivery date. Returns received after 14 days are reimbursed via Joah Brown eGift Card, which is sent to the email associated with your order. Refunds will not be issued until the return has arrived at the Joah Brown warehouse and has been approved.

settings.title: PRICE ADJUSTMENTS
settings.description: Price adjustments do not apply to items included in special and/or limited-time savings events.

settings.title: SHIPPING
settings.description:
All orders ship within 1-3 business days, pending availability and credit card verification. Once an order has been placed, it can not be adjusted or cancelled.

You will receive an email with tracking information after your order has been shipped. If you do not receive a shipping confirmation email within 3 business days, please contact jbteam@joahbrown.com.

Please note, we do not ship on weekends and/or holidays.

settings.title: AFTER HOURS
settings.description: No orders are shipped after hours (Office hours: M-F 9 am-5 pm PST), on weekends or on holidays.

settings.title: OVERNIGHT SHIPPING
settings.description: If you require overnight shipping, orders must be placed before 12:00 pm PST. If you place an order after 12:00 pm PST, your order will be processed to go out the next business day.

settings.title: PRE-ORDERS
settings.description: If you have purchased any pre-order item(s), the item(s) will ship as soon as inventory becomes available. You will receive tracking information as soon as we get your order and an additional email will be sent when your order leaves our warehouse. Payment for pre-order items will be collected upon placement of the order.

settings.title: RATES & DELIVERY TIME
settings.description:
We offer FREE 2-Day Delivery on all Domestic orders totaling $200 or more.

All domestic orders will arrive within 2-3 business days once shipped. Prices and delivery times vary based on zip code and weight of the order.

settings.title: MISSING PACKAGES
settings.description:
If your tracking information shows that your package was delivered but you can’t find it, please verify the shipping address. Look for a notice of attempted delivery and/or see if someone else accepted the delivery on your behalf. Please wait 3 days - in rare cases packages may say delivered up to 36 hours prior to arrival.

We will not replace merchandise that has been misplaced due to theft or a package being left outside for any length of time. We are not responsible once the package is in the hands of FedEx.

We will not refund or reship packages that have been marked as delivered by the carrier. We do not file claims on behalf of customers for missing packages.

settings.title: SHIPPING INSURANCE
settings.description: We offer shipping insurance through Route for potential shipping issues. Route is shipping insurance that will cover lost, stolen or damaged packages. For more information or to file a claim (if you purchased Route on an existing order), click here.

settings.title: Shipping
settings.description:
Free Shipping on Canadian Orders over $250. Free Shipping on International Orders over ​$300. Taxes and customs/broker fees not included. Please Note: All pricing is in USD.

We highly recommend that international customers purchase Route Insurance. Route Insurance will cover any lost, stolen or damaged packages. You can add Route to your order in the shipping portion of checkout.

All international orders will ship via FedEx, DHL, or USPS Priority International. Please provide your shipping address in English at checkout. Any other languages and missing fields will cause a delay in fulfilling your order. Please allow up to 3 weeks for your package to arrive if it is international. International shipping charges are based on total price of items, the weight of the package, and it’s destination. Risk of loss and title for merchandise shipped internationally will pass to you upon our delivery to the carrier. If the carrier attempts to deliver your order and you are not at home, please take the necessary steps to retrieve the order.

settings.title: TAXES AND DUTIES
settings.description: All applicable customs and broker fees along with taxes and duties are the sole responsibility of the customer. Customs authorities require that we state the value of your order directly on your package. It is at the sole discretion of the Customs agent to release your package. We have no control over possible delays due to Customs once the package has left the U.S. We have no control over how much duties and fees to your country are.

settings.title: POLICY AND TERMS
settings.description: By placing an order at Joah Brown, you are responsible for original shipping charges, all applicable Customs Import fees and/or surcharges and the cost of return shipping back to Joah Brown. This also applies to any shipments that are refused by you at delivery.

settings.title: REFUNDS & STORE CREDIT
settings.description:
For refunds or store credit, you may ship items to our warehouse using any prepaid and trackable return method.

JOAH BROWN LLC, Attn: Returns, 5045 6th St. #2, Carpinteria, CA 93013. 


Please include this form in your return package.

We cannot accept COD returns. We are unable to process exchanges for orders shipping internationally. If you have received a defective or incorrect item, please contact customer service at jbteam@joahbrown.com.

settings.title: SHIPPING
settings.description: Due to high volume of orders received, please allow 7-10 business days for your order to be fulfilled by our team. You will receive tracking information once your order has shipped.

settings.title: EXPRESS SHIPPING
settings.description: We will not be offering express shipping during our sitewide sale.

settings.title: INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING
settings.description: We ship worldwide and all orders are shipped delivery duties unpaid (DDU).

settings.title: SHIPPING INSURANCE
settings.description: We offer Route shipping protection at checkout. This insurance covers any lost, damaged, or stolen packages.

settings.title: ORDER ADJUSTMENTS
settings.description: We strive to process orders as quickly as possible. As a result, once an order has been placed, it cannot be modified or cancelled.

settings.title: PRICE ADJUSTMENTS
settings.description: We are unable to offer price adjustments on items purchased, before, after, or during sale periods. Sale pricing is offered on a limited and promotional basis. We are only able to honor sale pricing for purchases made during the period that the sale pricing is live.

settings.title: RETURNS
settings.description:
All orders placed during a sitewide sale or with a discount code of 25% off or more, are eligible to be returned for store credit only. We do not offer exchanges at this time. 

If an item is sent back in an attempt for a refund without going through the return portal, your item will be issued onto an e-gift card.

You can click here to visit our return portal.
